name: lead styles are inserted after paragraph styles

expectedCss.css: .prose { color: var(--tw-prose-body); max-width: 65ch; } .prose :where(p):not(:where([class~='not-prose'], [class~='not-prose'] *)) { margin-top: 1.25em; margin-bottom: 1.25em; } .prose :where([class~='lead']):not(:where([class~='not-prose'], [class~='not-prose'] *)) { color: var(--tw-prose-lead); font-size: 1.25em; line-height: 1.6; margin-top: 1.2em; margin-bottom: 1.2em; }
